attributes.action: Prevent Obama From Speaking In Westminster Regarding The In/Out Referendum..
attributes.additional_details: A Majority of British ppl want to Leave the Political Union of Europe .
attributes.background: Stop President Obama from speaking inside OUR Westminster Parliament concerning Britain staying inside the European Union..

government_response.summary: It is an established convention that members of either House can invite whoever they wish and in whatever capacity, to Parliament, to discuss and speak on a wide range of issues.
